name: wsi-to-dicom
label: WSI to dicom
description: This gear contains a tool that converts whole slide images (WSIs) to DICOM. To read the underlying whole slide images (WSIs), this tool relies on OpenSlide, which supports a variety of file formats.

Input_file.description: Input wsi file, supported by openslide

jsonFile.description: Dicom json file with additional tags

levels.description: Number of levels to generate, levels == 0 means number of levels will be read from wsi file.

downsamples.description: Size factor for each level for each level, downsample is size factor for each level (e.g. (1, 2, 10)).

stopOn.description: Level to stop generation ("Max Level" is -1).

sparse.description: Use TILED_SPARSE frame organization, by default it's TILED_FULL

compression.description: Compression, supported compressions: jpeg, jpeg2000, raw.

batch.description: Maximum frames in one file, as limit is exceeded new files is started ("No Maximum" is -1).

debug.description: Print debug messages: dimensions of levels, size of frames.

dropFirstRowAndColumn.description: Drop first row and column of the source image in order to workaround bug

author: Flywheel
cite:
OpenSlide: A Vendor-Neutral Software Foundation for Digital Pathology
Adam Goode, Benjamin Gilbert, Jan Harkes, Drazen Jukic, M. Satyanarayanan
Journal of Pathology Informatics 2013, 4:27
